## Configuration

The following configuration values can be set to customize the prow-cm installation.

### Global

| Value | Required/Optional | Description |
|-------|-------------------|-------------|
| `name` | Optional | description |

### prow-cm Configuration

| Value | Required/Optional | Description |
|-------|-------------------|-------------|
| `name` | Optional | description |
